* "Flyboys" (2006) - This action-packed and historically interesting movie tells the story of the Lafayette Escadrille, a group of young American volunteers who became the first fighter pilots in France during World War I. The film features a talented cast, including Tim Pigott-Smith, Mac McDonald, and Philip Winchester, and offers a thrilling look at the early days of aerial combat.
